```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	warning = FALSE,
	fig.width = 8, 
  fig.height = 6,
  out.width = "90%"
)
options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)
scale_colour_discrete = scale_colour_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
theme_set(theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom",plot.title = element_text(face = "bold")))
```


```{r}
data_hist = 
  read_csv("data/NYPD_Shooting_Incident_Data_Clean.csv") 
```



##2015-2020 total death by year
```{r}
year_plot = 
  data_hist %>% 
  filter(year >= 2010) %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate(count = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = count)) + 
  geom_point() 

  labs(x = "Year",
       y = "Total death"
       )

year_plot
```

##2015-2020 total death by perpetrator’s sex
```{r}
sex_plot = 
  data_hist %>% 
  filter(year >= 2010,
         perp_sex != "unknown") %>% 
  group_by(year, perp_sex) %>%
  mutate(n = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, group = n, fill = perp_sex)) + 
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") 
  
sex_plot
```

##2015-2020 total death by perpetrator’s race
```{r}
race_plot = 
  data_hist %>% 
  filter(year > 2014,
         perp_race != "unknown") %>% 
  group_by(perp_race) %>%
  mutate(n = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = perp_race, group = n)) + 
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") 
  
race_plot
```

##2015-2020 total death by hour in day
```{r}
incident_by_hour =
  data_hist %>%
  filter(year >= 2010) %>% 
  group_by(hour) %>%
  mutate(n = n()) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = hour, group = n)) + 
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  facet_grid(rows = vars(boro))
  
incident_by_hour
```
